title: Treehorn's Treasure
description: Edward Gorey Illustrated this book of Eeriness, condescending adults, cleavage, and money that grows from a tree- can it get any better than that? Treehorn discovers that his tree is sprouting dollar bills; gets some comic books, gum, lemonade, and chocolate, and then gets stuck at an Italian restaurant.
author: Florence Parry Heide
